column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////4. On the plus side...I had the roasted chicken
column2: which was delicious and surprisingly only $21. The bacon side was good
column3: but not as good as a bacon side we'd enjoyed at David Burke's.  The Old Fashioned (Meade) was good.  The corn for which Bavette's is known was good. The shrimp appetizer was good. The bread
column6: soft inside and good sourdough kick. The broccoli was good
column7: though I make it just as tasty at home (it's just roasted
